name: Jewelly Blocks
description:
Addictive, little jewels game featuring 3 different game modes, immersive physics, achievements, leaderboards and lots of fun.

I a m a solo, hobbyist game developer. The game has been implemented using my own game engine "GoateeEngine".

If you like what I am doing and want more games from me please write something :) I will appreciate it. Thanks!
